LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings
LocaleResource.Value: Nop One Page Checkout plugin Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.EnableRealOnePageCheckout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables/Disables the One Page Checkout plugin

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.FlyoutCartPanelSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the flyout shopping cart element. It is used by the Nop Ajax Cart plugin to update the flyout shopping cart after a product has been added to the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.ShoppingCartMenuLinkSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The selector for the html element in the header link, which contains information about the number of items in the shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PreselectLastBillingAddress.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Preselecting the last billing address base on his last order or from customer address book if he does not have orders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PreselectLastShippingAddress.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Preselecting the last shipping address base on his last order or from customer address book if he does not have orders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.EnableShipToSameAddress
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Ship To Same Address by default

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.EnableShipToSameAddress.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled this setting will, by default select ship to same address option

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedBillingAddressFields
LocaleResource.Value: Saved billing address fields on change

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedBillingAddressFields.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select which billing address fields will be saved in the database on any of the above address fields change.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedBillingAddressFields.RequiredField
LocaleResource.Value: Required by the Payment Methods update panel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedShippingAddressFields
LocaleResource.Value: Saved shipping address fields on change

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedShippingAddressFields.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select which shipping address fields will be saved in the database on any of the above address fields change.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.PersistedShippingAddressFields.RequiredField
LocaleResource.Value: Required by the Shipping Methods update panel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdatePaymentMethodsOnAddressFieldsUpdate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Payment methods panel when customer updates one of the above fields in the billing address.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateShippingMethodsOnAddressFieldsUpdate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Shipping methods panel when customer updates one of the above fields in the shipping address.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateShippingMethodsOnCartUpdate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Shipping methods panel when customer updates cart item quantity.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateOrderTotalOnPaymentMethodsUpdate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Order total panel when payment method is changed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateOrderTotalOnShippingMethodsUpdate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Order total panel when shipping method is changed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateOrderTotalBasedOnTaxAddressOnAddressFieldsChange
LocaleResource.Value: Address field change, based on tax address

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateOrderTotalBasedOnTaxAddressOnAddressFieldsChange.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Update Order total panel when one of the above address fields is changed from the address that you have set in your Tax Settings. For example, if you set your taxes to be based on Billing Address, and you change one of the above address fields, the order total panel will be updated.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.AjaxUpdateOrderTotalBasedOnTaxAddressOnAddressFieldsChange.RequiredField
LocaleResource.Value: Required by the Order Total update panel.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.ShowEstimateShipping.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the estimate shipping to be displayed on checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.ShowDiscountBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the discount box to be displayed on checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Admin.Settings.ShowGiftCardBox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want the gift card box to be displayed on checkout page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.NoShippingProvidersError
LocaleResource.Value: Your order cannot be completed at this time as there are no shipping methods available for it or pick up in store is disabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.InvalidForm
LocaleResource.Value: Some of the checkout fields are invalid!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.TermsOfServiceNotChecked
LocaleResource.Value: Please accept the terms of service before completing your order!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.NoPaymentMethodsOrRequired
LocaleResource.Value: No payment methods available or payment method is not required

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.NoPaymentMethodAvailable
LocaleResource.Value: Your order cannot be completed at this time as there are no payment methods available for it.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.NoShippingMethodAvailable
LocaleResource.Value: Your order cannot be completed at this time as there are no shipping methods available for it. Please make necessary changes in your shipping address.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RealOnePageCheckout.Public.GoogleMaps.MissingApiKey
LocaleResource.Value: You need to provide a google maps api key

LocaleResource.Name: Checkout.MinOrderPlacementAttemptInterval
LocaleResource.Value: Please wait several seconds before placing a new order!
